name: Baldi's Basics In True Chaos School!
name_original: Baldi's Basics In True Chaos School!
description:
Welcome To My Chaos Game! So I Remaked The Entire Baldi's Schoolhouse Without Copy And Paste! And Theres Clones Of Characters EVERYWHERE!

Story: Baldi Was Tried To Make A Difficulty Code For Stop Hacking The Baldi Universe But The Code Was Glitched And Starts Spawning Clones Of Baldi, Principal, 1st Prize And Other Characters! So Now All The Clones Are Around The School! And You Need To Get All 10 Notebooks And Escape This Schoolhouse BEFORE One Of The Clones Catches You!

Final Text Is: GOOD LUCK!
